title: Poster, Giselle Basler Freilichtspiele [Giselle Ballet Poster, Basel], 1959
title_raw: Giselle Basler Freilichtspiele [Giselle Ballet Poster, Basel]
medium: offset lithograph on white wove paper
inscribed:
Printed lower right at edge: Entwurf: Armin Hofmann Photo: Merkle  Druck: Wassermann AG. Basel
Verso: in ballpoint pen across lower third of sheet, Printed in Switzerland
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description:
The word Giselle is printed in large white text along left side of poster. The central image is a large black and white photographic image of a blured ballerina in mid-spin. Above left reads Basler / Freilichtspiele / 1959 / 19. -31. August / im / Rosenfeldpark in white text with a left justification.

Part of the Basel Outdoor Plays in Rosen feld Park

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, Giselle Basler Freilichtspiele [Giselle Ballet Poster, Basel], 1959. offset lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-142.
